publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2500 Mr Stewart Maxwell: No Smoking Day, 9 March 2005—That the Parliament notes that 9 March 2005 is No Smoking Day; supports the efforts of the estimated 70% of smokers who wish to give up smoking, and, as part of that support, commits itself to introducing a ban on smoking in all enclosed public places in Scotland by 2006 at the latest.
S2M-2500 No Smoking Day, 9 March 2005 (lodged on 1 March 2005) Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*
S2M-2500 No Smoking Day, 9 March 2005 (lodged on 1 March 2005) Brian Adam*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr John Swinney*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Pringle*, Mark Ballard*

S2M-2500 Mr Stewart Maxwell: No Smoking Day, 9 March 2005—That the Parliament notes that 9 March 2005 is No Smoking Day; supports the efforts of the estimated 70% of smokers who wish to give up smoking, and, as part of that support, commits itself to introducing a ban on smoking in all enclosed public places in Scotland by 2006 at the latest. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Alex Neil, Brian Adam, Eleanor Scott, Mr John Swinney, Rob Gibson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Tommy Sheridan, Mike Pringle, Mark Ballard, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-2500 No Smoking Day, 9 March 2005 (lodged on 1 March 2005) Patrick Harvie*
S2M-2500 No Smoking Day, 9 March 2005 (lodged on 1 March 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2500 No Smoking Day, 9 March 2005 (lodged on 1 March 2005) Dr Jean Turner*
